name: Very Beginner
description: For absolute beginners or those with significant physical limitations.

name: Beginner
description: Suitable for individuals new to exercise or returning after a long break.

name: Intermediate
description: For those with some exercise experience, capable of performing basic movements with good form.

name: Advanced
description: For experienced individuals with a high level of fitness and strength.

name: Expert
description: For elite athletes or those with exceptional strength, endurance, and technique.
